What are the treatments for warfarin sensitivity ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of warfarin sensitivity:  - Food and Drug Administration Medication Guide  - MedlinePlus Drugs & Supplements: Warfarin  - My46 Trait Profile  - PharmGKB  - Warf
